small_cards.title: Save on shipping
small_cards.description: Create a free account and enjoy discounts on shipping, easy access to saved delivery addresses, quick payments using your stored profile settings and more.

small_cards.title: Take control of your home deliveries
small_cards.description: Sign up for HSC® to place holds, give delivery instructions, sign remotely, and more. Stay informed with tracking alerts and notifications.

small_cards.title: Hold packages for pickup
small_cards.description: Help keep your deliveries safe when you ask us to hold packages at one of thousands of nearby HSC® locations. Track your package to begin.

wide_cards.title: Ship more sustainably
wide_cards.description: Get free packing options for your HSC Premium shipments that are reusable, recyclable, and made from recycled materials.

wide_cards.title: We’re working to deliver a smaller carbon footprint
wide_cards.description: To help reach our goal of carbon neutral operations by 2040, we’re investing in new technologies—like the transition to all-electric delivery vehicles. See how we’re transitioning, plus other innovative solutions.

wide_cards.title: Small businesses making a big impact
wide_cards.description: Learn how some of the previous Small Business Grant Contest winners, including 2021 winner JCs Wildlife, are finding new and innovative ways to make their industries more sustainable in the fight against climate change.
